name: True360.tv
summary: Embark on a virtual journey across Iowa with True360.tv, crafted by Iowa State students to offer an intimate look at the state. Experience the thrill of Knoxville Raceways, the warmth of Blank Park Zoo, and educational tours of the capital, all from home. True360.tv isn't just an app; it's a gateway to Iowa's spirit, designed for immersive, high-quality content.
